content.raw:
Another argument for bumping default: Gazebo's default branch, which expects ign-transport3, builds against ign-transport default, but crashes at runtime. Backtrace:

~~~
Thread 1 "gzserver" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
__GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x171) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:67
67	../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  __GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x171) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:67
#1  0x00007ffff7a895a2 in __gthread_mutex_lock (__mutex=0x171) at /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/5/bits/gthr-default.h:748
#2  0x00007ffff7a9ba50 in std::mutex::lock (this=0x171) at /usr/include/c++/5/mutex:135
#3  0x00007ffff7ac3310 in std::lock_guard<std::mutex>::lock_guard (this=0x7fffffffc280, __m=...) at /usr/include/c++/5/mutex:386
#4  0x00007ffff6dfaf2c in ignition::transport::Discovery<ignition::transport::ServicePublisher>::Advertise (this=0x1, _publisher=...)
    at /usr/local/include/ignition/transport3/ignition/transport/Discovery.hh:286
#5  0x00007ffff3a8bdc2 in ignition::transport::Node::Advertise<ignition::msgs::StringMsg, ignition::msgs::Plugin_V>(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, std::function<void (ignition::msgs::StringMsg const&, ignition::msgs::Plugin_V&, bool&)>&, ignition::transport::AdvertiseServiceOptions const&) (this=0x1c17120, _topic="/physics/info/plugin", _cb=..., _options=...)
    at /usr/local/include/ignition/transport3/ignition/transport/Node.hh:526
~~~
content.html:
Another argument for bumping default: Gazebo's default branch, which expects ign-transport3, builds against ign-transport default, but crashes at runtime. Backtrace:

Thread 1 "gzserver" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
__GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x171) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:67
67  ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  __GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x171) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:67
#1  0x00007ffff7a895a2 in __gthread_mutex_lock (__mutex=0x171) at /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/5/bits/gthr-default.h:748
#2  0x00007ffff7a9ba50 in std::mutex::lock (this=0x171) at /usr/include/c++/5/mutex:135
#3  0x00007ffff7ac3310 in std::lock_guard<std::mutex>::lock_guard (this=0x7fffffffc280, __m=...) at /usr/include/c++/5/mutex:386
#4  0x00007ffff6dfaf2c in ignition::transport::Discovery<ignition::transport::ServicePublisher>::Advertise (this=0x1, _publisher=...)
    at /usr/local/include/ignition/transport3/ignition/transport/Discovery.hh:286
#5  0x00007ffff3a8bdc2 in ignition::transport::Node::Advertise<ignition::msgs::StringMsg, ignition::msgs::Plugin_V>(std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > const&, std::function<void (ignition::msgs::StringMsg const&, ignition::msgs::Plugin_V&, bool&)>&, ignition::transport::AdvertiseServiceOptions const&) (this=0x1c17120, _topic="/physics/info/plugin", _cb=..., _options=...)
    at /usr/local/include/ignition/transport3/ignition/transport/Node.hh:526
